title: S2 Ep7: A history of international finance
itunes:title: A history of international finance
description: A new data set compiles the history of international finance spanning a century and a half, revealing new information about globalisation, crises and capital flows. Rui Esteves of the Graduate Institute, Geneva, tells Tim Phillips what lessons it offers for policymakers today.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
